overview: The Hoff was otherwise engaged, but only the most ardent Baywatch fans will be disappointed by his absence as a collection of the hottest, horniest Czech boy-babes head for the Med to savor a diet of sun, sea, sand and sex, sex, sex! Hard cocks, hungry mouths and very willing asses abound – filthy antics that the local coastguards only encourage by their own lewd sense of debauchery! And with every condom machine in the resort out of order the result is a raw-crazy, spunk fiesta that’ll have you spurting time and time again!
title: Gaywatch
